divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside of my house, and a bright light straight in front of my neighborhood caught my eye. It was in the sky flying twords me. It caught my eye because of the brightness. It flew very very slow ,right over my head. There was no sound what so ever coming from the object. It cruised right over and on until I couldn't see it anymore.
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Richmond
There were no other sightings in Richmond on or around October 17th 2011
Summary: not sure what it was, it was bright ,made no sound and was like no airplane I ever saw!
